name: Bright Idea
description:
This was the first game playable game that I had made as part of a small team, Lucky Mastermind. The idea is that you are a sea cucumber that glows, trying to not have your light extinguished by the squids.

Designer - Brayden Beavis

Designer - Ash Flowers

Designer - Aidan Kwong

Designer - Solomon Haartmann 

W,A,S,D to move and space to jump.

This game does contain some bugs, texture scales may shift depending on what your aspect ratio is.
